--- named_schemas_alter_table_drop_constraints.sql
ALTER TABLE sch1.ShoppingCarts DROP CONSTRAINT FKShoppingCartsCustomers
--- AST
&ast.AlterTable{
  Alter: 0,
  Name:  &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 12,
        NameEnd: 16,
        Name:    "sch1",
      },
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 17,
        NameEnd: 30,
        Name:    "ShoppingCarts",
      },
    },
  },
  TableAlteration: &ast.DropConstraint{
    Drop: 31,
    Name: &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 47,
      NameEnd: 71,
      Name:    "FKShoppingCartsCustomers",
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER TABLE sch1.ShoppingCarts DROP CONSTRAINT FKShoppingCartsCustomers
